title: Jury selection in Dennis Oland's second-degree murder trial enters Day 2
content:
SAINT JOHN, N.B. - Jury selection continued today for the trial of Dennis Oland, who has pleaded not guilty to a charge of second-degree murder in the death of his father, high-profile businessman Richard Oland. 
  
The 46-year-old entered the plea as the process of selecting a jury began Tuesday at a hockey arena in Saint John, N.B.
